description: The music challenge awaits. Are you ready to show off your musical knowledge?
webInfoContent: This platform allows you to compete in music challenges and improve your musical knowledge. Join our community and explore different game modes!
howToPlayContent: Select a game mode, listen to song snippets, and guess the title or artist. Compete with others and climb the leaderboard!
updatesContent: Stay up-to-date with the latest news, including new game modes, platform improvements, and special events. Donâ€™t miss out on any updates!
configureClassic: Set Up Your Game - Classic Mode
configureArtists: Set Up Your Game - Artist Mode
artistsParticipate: Artists who participate in the song
configGame: Set Up Your Game - Mutated Mode
classicDescription: Take on the classic challenge by guessing popular songs with quick snippets.
artistDescription: Show off your artist knowledge by guessing songs from their hits.
mutatedDescription: Customize your experience with playlists, genres, or specific artists in the mutated mode.
